title: Bug 114903 - Default values are not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When creating report parameters and setting default values, the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog fails to display these default values.
OB: The 'Show Report Parameters' dialog does not show the default values for the created report parameters.
EB: The 'Show Report Parameters' dialog should display the default values assigned to the report parameters when they are created and set.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create several report parameters.
2. Set default values for the created report parameters.
3. Drag the report parameters to the Layout.
4. Open the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog and observe that the default values are not displayed.
